law.catch_line: Spitting in food establishment -- Employees to wash hands.
law.text: No person shall expectorate on the food or utensils in, or on the floor or wall of, any place of the kind mentioned in KRS 217.280. All persons who handle the food shall, before beginning work and after visiting the toilet, wash their hands thoroughly in clean water.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2060b-8.
